section.title: Fn::GetAtt
section.para: The intrinsic function Fn::GetAtt returns the value of an attribute from a resource in the configuration file.

listitem.para: The logical name of the resource that contains the attribute you want.
The name of the resource-specific attribute whose value you want. See the resource's reference page for details about the attributes available for that resource type.

section.title: Example
section.para: This example returns a string containing the DNS name of the LoadBalancer with the logical name MyLB.

section.title: See Also
section.para: For more information about the values returned by Fn::GetAtt for a particular resource, see the Return Values section of the resource's reference page.
